data.title: Parties and Events Made Easy
data.meta_description: Looking for a unique place to hold your event? Topgolf is the best place to go for your corporate event, social party or team building.
data.text:
What Can We Plan With You?

Work with our team to plan a curated event, giving you and your guests a chance to handle business or just have a good time. With food and play at the core of everything we plan, the only limit to what we can host is your imagination.

More Fun For Your Funds

Sundays

Sunday is the Weekendâs Best Value Day toÂ Play

Mondays

Save on Mondays with Half-Price Event Game Play

Tuesdays - Fridays

Get 30 Minutes of FREE Game Play

9 AM- 5 PM

Select a venue to view complete information and pricing:

Change Location

PROMOTIONAL. Free 30 minutes of Topgolf game play for 1 & 2 bay reservation and event products between 9am - 5pm on Mondays - Fridays when a reservation is booked through the Topgolf app or website (not valid for walk-in). Additionally, 3+ Bay Events booked at a minimum of 2 hours will also receive a Free 30 minutes of game play between 9am - 5pm on Mondays - Fridays (revenue minimums may apply). Excludes youth events, field trips and fundraisers. Cannot be combined with any other game play coupon, offer, or promotion. Free game play must be used during the same visit. No cash value. Offer valid at participating U.S. Topgolf locations only. Not valid at other Topgolf Las Vegas, Myrtle Beach, Swing Suite or Toptracer Range locations. Excludes arcade games. Void where prohibited. Offer subject to change. For reservations between 9am - 5pm on Tuesdays at Topgolf venues participating in Half-Price Golf Every Tuesday, guests will receive half-price game play as part of the Half-Off Golf Every Tuesday promotion.

50% off Topgolf game play is valid on Mondays for 3+ bay events only. Excludes youth parties, spirit nights, field trips and military groups. Cannot be combined with any other game play offer or promotion, and not valid for walk-in or reservation use. Offer valid at participating U.S. Topgolf locations only. Not valid at Las Vegas, Swing Suite or Toptracer Range locations. Excludes arcade games. Void where prohibited. Additional restrictions may apply and offer subject to change.
